lines.text: The fact that Fred hated ever human except me really meant something.
[last lines]

[voice over narration]
I still think about her. I guess, still love her. She might have been even more alone than I was. I miss her.
It's nice and cool in here. I missed my ride. Can you take me to Olympic and Fairfax?
No.
Just a sec
[to her Father]
Dad, she's my best friend.
I'm a geek.

There's something about her. I don't know. Those lips. You know lips are suppose to be the perfect reflection of a woman's anatomy. Not that I'm a lesbian... Well. Maybe I am. No, definitely not. I told my mother I was just for shock value. She said "fine. As long as you don't smoke".
Leave it open.
It's supposed to rain tonight.
Then open it wider. What kinda girls are impressed by suicide?
I like her.
She has a hole in her nose.
Yeah well a lot of girls do.
I think you'd be embarrassed.
What?
Getting caught lying all the time. Did you tell her you're black too?
You don't want me to have any friends do you?
People you have to lie to so they like you arn't worth your friendship.
I like the ivy.
Well the cross makes me think of death, but the ivy is life. Sort of the tragic and hopeful you know.
So what are you busted for?
I gotta keep a certain grade point average. I'm slipping in biology.
My name's Sylvie Cooper.
So Cooper, what they nail you for?
Everybody hates me.
Oh well everybody hates me too.
Who slashed their wrists?
Oh, Ivy, this is my Mom, Georgie.
This is great.
You're still my best friend.
'Till death.
I'm a geek.
You're beautiful.
I thought you both could use this.
Get out.
What the hell are you doing in my Mom's car?
I found the key.
Please, stop.
I want to hear you say it! Are you excusing me of something?
Why? Did you do something?
No, Fred, come here.
No, Fred, come here.
You killed her.
She wanted to die.
Hello, Mr. Cooper, care for anything?
It won't ever happen again.

She was definitely a turnoff, too overt. Look at her. Obviously, big problems. Most girls don't fly through the air with their skirt around their waist. Supergirl at least had the decency to wear tights.
Lips are supposed to be a perfect reflection of another part of a woman's anatomy.
She said, Fine, just as long as you don't smoke. Which, of course, is my main joy in life. Probably oral compensation.
You rich fuckhead!
I worked for it!
TMJ. It's stress-related. It gives you terrible headaches, makes your jaw stiff.
Almost killed Burt Reynolds.
People you have to lie to aren't worth your friendship.
Energy never dies. It just changes form.
One day with the top down is better than a lifetime in a box.
Her acceptance didn't make me think less of her. It made me think more of me.
A lot of people think death is contagious.
I always seem to be looking at life from the wrong side of the window.
I know it's stupid to be jealous about a dog.It's probably because I have low self-esteem.
I guess you give up things when you take on a friendship.
Maybe if I hadn't been so selfish. Maybe if I could have told her I loved her maybe things would be different now.
